## Flask Sum API

```python
from flask import Flask, request, jsonify
app = Flask(__name__)

@app.get('/sum')
def sum_route():
    a = float(request.args.get('a','0'))
    b = float(request.args.get('b','0'))
    return jsonify(result=a+b)
```

## Streamlit CSV Summary

```python
import streamlit as st
import pandas as pd

st.title('Returns Summary')
upl = st.file_uploader('CSV with date,symbol,close')
if upl:
    df = pd.read_csv(upl, parse_dates=['date']).sort_values(['symbol','date'])
    df['ret'] = df.groupby('symbol')['close'].pct_change()
    st.dataframe(df.groupby('symbol')['ret'].describe())
```
